page.title: 18WEEKENDS 2
page.content: On Fridays when I come home from school I have to go to modern and tap dancing.My mum does the food shopping while I'm at dancing. Afterwards we catch the bus home.Then I have dinner. I go to bed later on Fridays because there isn't any school on Saturdays. On Saturdays I get up and watch T.V. until my mum gets up.I have breakfast then I get washed and dressed. My dad picks me up at 10-00.Then he has to shift his drums from hotel to hotel.At 12-15 he takes me to ballet.Then I go back to his house for lunch.Later I go to my nans,or we go out. I sometimes stay the night at my dads or I come home in the evening.I go bed later on a Saturday as well.On Sunday I play with my friends.At 1-00 we have a roast dinner.Then I go out to one of my family.Bedtime is at the normal time.{By Amanda Billings age 11
